description: Installation of kitchen extraction system to side elevation
decision_conditions: <p>The proposed ducting shall be painted black. to the satisfaction of the local planning authority to blend in with the surrounding townscape.&nbsp; &nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To ensure the ducting is visually acceptable in terms of its colour.&nbsp;</p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p>Prior to the use of the extract duct and associated equipment in connection with the ground floor use, full details of a Cleaning and Maintenance Schedule shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority in writing. The details shall&nbsp;include:</p><span id="docs-internal-guid-532e1e82-7fff-276d-6630-814c331b08ca"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">i. extractor hood canopy and baffle filters to be cleaned at least weekly; </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">ii. extractor system, ductwork cleaning to be scheduled every three </span>months; and </p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">iii. filters to be replaced as recommended by supplier/manufacturer.</span></p></span><p><br></p><span id="docs-internal-guid-e368195b-7fff-1fb4-8e76-873ef8ebd1d4"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The submitted information shall include a copy of a signed contractual agreement documentation for the cleaning and maintenance schedule. </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p></span><p>REASON:&nbsp; To ensure that the extraction system operates satisfactorily.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The extractor fan and equipment, hereby permitted, shall not be operated in association with the use of the ground floor</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> until a post-installation noise assessment has been carried out and submitted in writing and approved by the local planning authority to confirm </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">compliance with the noise criteria. The scheme shall be implemented in accordance </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">with the approved details and attenuation measures, and they shall be permanently </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">retained and maintained in working order for the duration of the use and their </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">operation.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><b style="font-weight:normal;" id="docs-internal-guid-0edfa0d7-7fff-056a-a552-ccec6fc34357"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Reason: To protect the amenities of adjoining occupiers and the surrounding area.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Any new plant shall be installed, together with any associated ancillary equipment,</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">so as to prevent the transmission of noise and vibration into neighbouring premises. The rated noise level from all plant and ancillary equipment shall not increase the existing background noise level (10dB below) when measured 1m external from the nearest residential or noise sensitive premises. An assessment of the expected noise levels shall be carried out by a suitably qualified (IOA accredited) and experienced acoustic consultant, in accordance with BS 4142:2014+A1:2019 ‘Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound,’ and any mitigation measures necessary to achieve the above required noise levels shall be submitted to the local planning authority in writing for approval. </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The plant shall thereafter be installed and maintained in accordance with the approved details.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-eb0ef83c-7fff-d043-5411-d19eed98903c"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Reason: To protect the amenities of neighbouring occupiers and the surrounding area. </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Soundproofing shall be provided to ensure that dwelling houses, flats and rooms for residential purposes sharing a party element with a premises to which this planning permission relates shall receive a minimum airborne sound insulation on the party element which achieved DnT’w of 43 dB before the first use of the development hereby approved.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;" id="docs-internal-guid-984649a5-7fff-eae5-e9b5-29b38da858a9"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that neighbouring occupiers do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise from activities within the premises</span></p><p><br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The use may only be carried out between 08:00 am hours and 21.00 hours Sunday to Thursdays and 09:00 hours to 23:00 hours on Friday and Saturday.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.656;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the use is operated in a satisfactory manner and does not unduly disturb adjoining occupiers or prejudice local amenity generally.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 72pt; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.2;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-1a082dec-7fff-8769-efee-b1347d408c88"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.656;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 72pt; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.2;"><br></p>
